alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Graham; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 12:21PM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected resulting in low visibilities. Total snow accumulations around 2 inches are possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Wednesday to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Wednesday to 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An area of freezing drizzle may develop along and east of Highway 83 in Kansas late morning through the afternoon Wednesday. Life threatening cold conditions are expected for nearly 36 hours along with snow and blowing snow creating near blizzard conditions Wednesday night. The combination of these hazards will cause very dangerous travel conditions Wednesday night, especially if becoming stranded as road closures are possible.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Decatur; Graham; Norton; Rawlins; Sheridan; Thomas
